account_denied.title: We need more information
account_denied.body: We sent you an email in regards of your verification.

ghostmode-reminder.title: Nobody can find you, {firstName}!
ghostmode-reminder.body: Switch from ghost mode to live, to cross paths with people in real life.

new_event.title: Pack a Friend and visit {venueWithArticleIfNeeded}
new_event.body: Be there on {date} between {startTime} - {endTime} to increase your odds of crossing paths with someone.

new-event.subject: Your Chance - Swarm Event in Innsbruck (Offlinery)
new-event.taskIntro: We've got an exciting opportunity for you to increase your odds of meeting someone and to embrace spontaneity.
new-event.eventDetails: Be here, to increase your odds of meeting someone.
new-event.taskDescription: Grab one of your friends and meet up at {venueWithArticleIfNeeded} on {date} between {startTime} and {endTime} as you usually do.
new-event.eventExplanation: With one difference: We told other users to be there as well. If someone matching your preferences is nearby, you or the other person will be notified that you are open to meet people.
new-event.note: No pressure, just possibilities. Show up, be open, and see what unfolds.
new-event.reminder: Your next great connection could be just around the corner.
new-event.footer: Embrace the unexpected. Life happens outside your comfort zone.

request-account-deletion.subject: Offlinery: Account Deletion Requested
request-account-deletion.receivedRequest: We've received a request to permanently delete your account. This action is irreversible and will erase all your data from our systems.
request-account-deletion.proceedInstructions: If you wish to proceed, click the link below:
request-account-deletion.expirationNote: Note: This link will expire in 24 hours for security reasons.
request-account-deletion.warningMessage: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: This action cannot be undone! ‚ö†Ô∏è
request-account-deletion.feedbackRequest: Before you go, we'd appreciate knowing why you're leaving. Please share your thoughts by emailing office@offlinery.io.
request-account-deletion.securityWarning: If you didn't request this deletion, please contact our support team immediately to secure your account.
request-account-deletion.footer: This is an automated message. Do not reply to this email.

account-verification-verified.subject: Offlinery: Your account has been verified
account-verification-verified.title: Offlinery: Account verified
account-verification-verified.verificationSuccess: Awesome news! Your Offlinery account is now verified and ready to go.
account-verification-verified.nextSteps: What's next? Start connecting with people around you or wait for someone to approach you. The offline world is now at your fingertips!
account-verification-verified.disclaimer: If you didn't sign up for Offlinery, no worries. You can safely ignore this email.
account-verification-verified.footer: This is an automated message. Please don't reply to this email.

account-verification-denied.subject: Offlinery: One last step for your verification
account-verification-denied.title: Complete Your Offlinery Verification
account-verification-denied.taskIntro: We've got an exciting challenge that'll help you grow and show us you're ready for genuine offline connections.
account-verification-denied.taskDescription: Your mission: Give 3 {oppositeGender} you don't know a genuine, heartfelt compliment - then simply walk away. No strings attached, just spread some joy!
account-verification-denied.callExplanation: Afterward, we'd love to hear about your experience! What did you learn? What would you do differently? Your insights are super valuable to us.
account-verification-denied.verificationNote: If our chat goes well (and we're sure it will!), we'll be thrilled to welcome you to Offlinery.
account-verification-denied.reminder: Remember: Complete your mission before the call! üéØ
account-verification-denied.footer: This is an automated message. Please don't reply to this email.

email-verification.subject: Welcome to Offlinery! Confirm your Email
email-verification.title: Email Verification
email-verification.thankYou: Thank you for signing up! Please use the verification code below to confirm your email address:
email-verification.instructions: Enter this code in the Offlinery app to complete your email verification.
email-verification.disclaimer: If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it.
email-verification.footer: This is an automated message, please do not reply to this email.

request-password-reset.subject: Offlinery: Password Reset Code
request-password-reset.title: Password Reset Code
request-password-reset.receivedRequest: We've received a request to reset your password for your Offlinery account.
request-password-reset.instructions: To reset your password, please use the following 6-digit code:
request-password-reset.expirationNote: Note: This code will expire in 15 minutes for security reasons.
request-password-reset.ignoreMessage: ‚ö†Ô∏è If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email. ‚ö†Ô∏è
request-password-reset.securityNote: For the security of your account, never share this code with anyone.
request-password-reset.contactSupport: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at support@offlinery.io.
request-password-reset.footer: This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

ghostmode-reminder.subject: Ghost Mode Reminder (Offlinery)
ghostmode-reminder.timeInGhost: You've been in Ghost Mode for {intervalHour}.
ghostmode-reminder.impact: While Ghost Mode helps protect your privacy, it also means you can't meet new people or be discovered by others who might be interested in meeting you.
ghostmode-reminder.suggestion: Switch to Live Mode within Offlinery to start meeting people in your area again!
ghostmode-reminder.footer: You received this email because you enabled Ghost Mode in your settings. You can change this anytime.

safety-call-booked-reminder.subject: Book Your Quick Safety Call - Offlinery
safety-call-booked-reminder.reminderMessage: Just a friendly reminder to schedule your quick safety call with us! This is an important step to unlock the full potential of approaching people through Offlinery.
safety-call-booked-reminder.importanceMessage: In this casual 15-minute chat, we'll do a quick emotional intelligence check to make sure everyone in our community feels safe and comfortable. Once approved, you'll be ready to make real-life connections!
safety-call-booked-reminder.timeEstimate: It's super quick - just 15 minutes of your time! ‚è∞
safety-call-booked-reminder.closingMessage: Not interested in approaching others? No problem! You can skip this call and still be approached by others - just change this setting in the app.
safety-call-booked-reminder.beApproachAlternative: Want to become active later? You can always come back and complete the safety call when you're ready.
safety-call-booked-reminder.footer: This is an automated message from your friends at Offlinery.

account-deletion-confirmation.subject: Account Deleted Successfully
account-deletion-confirmation.message: Your account has been permanently deleted. All your personal data has been removed from our systems. We're sorry to see you go and hope you've enjoyed using our service.
